about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure in 'Slime Mutation,' a thrilling top-down arena shooter where you take on the role of a resilient slime facing relentless waves of creatures. Survive, evolve, and conquer in this rogue-like survivor indie game, crafted with love and dedication by a solo developer.

In 'Slime Mutation,' you'll experience heart-pounding action as you battle hordes of creatures. Collect valuable in-game currency to upgrade your slime's capabilities in a unique shop. Enhance your slime's skills and become an unstoppable force in this challenging world.

Unleash your inner strategist and adapt to each wave of enemies as you evolve your slime into a formidable combatant, thanks to the various items you'll collect during your playthroughs. Understand their uses, but be cautious, as not all of them are worth taking. 'Slime Mutation' is a testament to the passion of indie game development and the creativity of a single developer.

Are you ready to mutate, survive, and thrive in the world of Slime Mutation? Join the adventure today and experience the thrill of evolution and conquest
